post:
**General Information:**

ClamHost Xen VPS's with 768MB of RAM, 25GB of RAID 10 HDD Storage, 1 IPv4 included, 20Gbps DDoS Mitigation, hosted in our quarter cab in Los Angeles. All our VPS are Unmanaged by default for a extra $5 Per Month we offer a Fully Managed VPS Product. we can help with mutiple software configurations. Just email sales@clamhost.com if you have any questions. relating to any of our products and services.

**Node Specs:**

    Dual X5650 
    72GB RAM
    4X 1TB Drives Enterprise HDDs
    Enterprise HP Grade Hardware
    Hardware RAID 10 Adaptec 5805 + BBU

**VPS Features:**

    20Gbps Anti-DDoS
    Additional IPv4 are affordable
    24 hour resolution on all tickets
    Management available on VPS's for $5 additional monthly
    OS Reloads via SolusVM for Xen-PV
    OS Reloads via SolusVM for Xen-HVM

**Why Choose ClamHost:**

    ClamHost has been in business for over a year! 
    We own most of our hardware.
    Automatic rDNS updates.
    DNS Management available
    Secondary Private Network Included
    Friendly and Knowledgeable support

Xen-PV is for our Linux services, and Xen-HVM is for ClamHost's Windows services. we do not offer Licensed Windows VPS. you have to either activate a Trial or supply your own License.
